analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.textnormalizer.annotations.RegexTokenFilter
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Remove every token that does or does not match a given regular expression.
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: regex
configurationParameter.description: Every token that does or does not match this regular expression will be removed.

configurationParameter.name: mustMatch
configurationParameter.description: If this parameter is set to true (default), retain only tokens that match the regex given in #PARAM_REGEX. If set to false, all tokens that match the given regex are removed.
